sentences: Vincent Mark "Sparky" Matejka (born January 2, 1967) is an American Southern rock guitarist.
He joined Lynyrd Skynyrd in 2006, replacing Hughie Thomasson who had left to reform Outlaws.
He first played with the band on their Christmas Time Again album in 2000 and was credited with guitar and vocals.
He played guitar on tour with The Kinleys in 1998.
Matejka is a former student of the North Texas State University (now UNT) jazz program, and studied under guitar educator Jack Peterson.
